Title: Stupid 7
Writer: Pali Bhupinder Singh (dialogue), Pali Bhupinder Singh (screenplay), Pali Bhupinder Singh (story)
Actors: Guggu Gill, Razia Sukhbir, Millind Gaba, Pukhraj Bhalla
Plot: Seven stories interweave to create this relatable tale of the gap between teenagers and the older generation.
